attributes.action: Tony Blair NOT to do any deals over the EU Charter - you have no mandate and are on your way out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair is preparing to cave in to pressure to sign Britain up to a sweeping new human rights charter.  He is preparing to do a deal over the European charter amid fears that the failed Europen constitution will collapse if he refuses to compromise.  Tonies cronies do not have a mandate to agree to any deals of this kind.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
